properties.Name: BusinessMetricType
properties.Description:
Business ratios are categorized into 6 categories:

- Sales Ratios
- Profit Ratios
- Debt & Capital Ratios
- Efficiency Ratios
- Marketing Ratios
- Investment Ratios

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Business Metric Type.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Business Metric Type.

Columns.Name: BusinessMetricTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Business Metric Type.
